build.buildCommand: sh -lc 'if [ -f go.mod ] && [ -f main.go ]; then :; elif [ -d app/server ]; then cd app/server; elif [ -d server ]; then cd server; else echo "server dir not found" && exit 1; fi; go build -o plandex-server main.go'

deploy.startCommand: sh -lc 'if [ -f plandex-server ]; then :; elif [ -d app/server ]; then cd app/server; elif [ -d server ]; then cd server; else echo "server dir not found" && exit 1; fi; ./plandex-server'
